result.name: Search for polymorphisms in the structural regions of the LGB1, LGB2 and LALBA genes of the domestic horse and their association with expression level. National Science Centre (Poland) grant: 2016/21/N/NZ9/01350
result.description: Screening for polymorphism in LGB1, LGB2. Molecular analysis and comparison of genes structure. Association studies of selected polymorphisms with genes expression level.
result.center: Poznan University of Life Sciences, Poznan, Poland
